overview: A 2011 comedy adventure brickfilm directed by Maxime Marion and co-written with Lilian Ginet. It is the second film in the Henri & Edmond series. After downloading a song, Henri is tracked down by a copyright protection agency. There's only one plastic figure who can save him, his best friend Edmond, the fireman.
tagline: Henri et Edmond are tracked down by a copyright protection agency after they've downloaded music illegally on the internet.
title: COPYRIGHT
